Uses of Interface
org.daisy.common.priority.timetracking.TimeFunctionFactory

  • Packages that use TimeFunctionFactory 
    Package Description
    org.daisy.common.priority.timetracking
    Utilities for tracking task times and normalisation functions.

    • Uses of TimeFunctionFactory in org.daisy.common.priority.timetracking

      Classes in org.daisy.common.priority.timetracking that implement TimeFunctionFactory 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LinearTimeNormalizer
      Provides functions that perform linear normalisations given using as reference.
      Methods in org.daisy.common.priority.timetracking that return TimeFunctionFactory 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static TimeFunctionFactory TimeFunctions.newLinearTimeFunctionFactory()
      Returns a new factory that produces LinearTimeNormalizer objects.
      Methods in org.daisy.common.priority.timetracking with parameters of type TimeFunctionFactory 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static TimeTrackerFactory TimeTrackerFactory.newFactory(int size, TimeFunctionFactory functionFactory)
      Instantiates a new TimeTrackerFactory that will create TimeTrackers with the given buffer size and the function factory.
      Constructors in org.daisy.common.priority.timetracking with parameters of type TimeFunctionFactory 
      Constructor and Description
      TimeTracker(int frequency, UpdatablePriorityBlockingQueue<T> queue, TimeFunctionFactory functionFactory)
      Creates a new TimeTracker with a buffer of the provided size, that updates the given queue using the functions provided by the factory.
